disclaimerText: The designations employed and the presentation of material in this map do not imply the expression of any opinion whatsoever on the part of the Secretariat concerning the legal status of any country, territory, city or area or of its authorities, or concerning the delimitation of its frontiers or boundaries.
ratifiedTitle: Countries that have deposited their instrument of ratification but have not yet completed the 90 day waiting period before the Protocol enters into force for their country.
